title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, October 1, 2020
description: It's the birthday of Jimmy Carter (1924), who said, “A strong nation, like a strong person, can afford to be gentle, firm, thoughtful, and restrained."
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of Jimmy Carter (1924), who said, “A strong nation, like a strong person, can afford to be gentle, firm, thoughtful, and restrained."
